title: HocusPortus
author: HocusPortus
content: HELLO  Here is a presentation of PORTUS NETWORKHello everyone! We'd like to celebrate our partnership with Polygon by organising a quiz contest with prizes for the community  As we cannot yet offer the Portus Network token for sale, the prize per correct answer will be 20 $MATIC.The questions will be taken from our website from our twitter account and Litepaper.The contest will start at 18:00 UTC on the 18 of May. The rules are simple - the first correct answer for each question gets the prize! The contest will take place on telegram.If you have any questions, you can find us on the telegram group  WEBSITE         Twitter          Telegram         Litepaper
